name: Environmental Research
description: A research course for all students in the School combining report writing, independent and group-based research on an interdisciplinary topic. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
prerequisites: Completion of 10.0 FCE including ENV221H1/ENV222H1; and enrolment in one of the Environmental Studies Major, Environmental Ethics Major, Environment & Health Specialist, Environmental Chemistry Specialist or Environment & Toxicology Specialist programs; or permission of the Undergraduate Associate Director
